Articles.Content:
The working attempt (but it cannot loose contact with the ground), but is still just a proof of concept:![LlO8kyO.png](http://i.imgur.com/LlO8kyO.png)

First attempt:

![dFirCVI.png](http://i.imgur.com/dFirCVI.png)
I have no words... except those... and the ones that followed them... and the others... and... I'm done now.

Are those... radial Lv-1s used as treads? That's very cool.

Would be nice to see a gif of video at some point.

A video might come when it is complete. It needs the armour to keep the treads from coming off.

> 
> It was the treads.
> 
>
